mapper.insert: insert into chat_message(channel_no, company_member_no, parent_message_no, type, content, is_edit, message_json, reg_datetime, updated_datetime) VALUES (#{channel_no}, #{company_member_no}, #{parent_message_no}, #{type}, #{content}, false, #{message_json, typeHandler=com.middleware.JsonObjectTypeHandler}, now(), now())
mapper.update: update chat_message SET content = #{content}, is_edit = true, updated_datetime = now() WHERE no = #{no}
mapper.select: select * from chat_message WHERE channel_no = #{channel_no} ORDER BY reg_datetime DESC, no LIMIT 50

SET @LAST_REG_DATE = (select reg_datetime from chat_message WHERE no = #{last_message_no}); select * from chat_message WHERE channel_no = #{channel_no} AND (reg_datetime < @LAST_REG_DATE OR (reg_datetime = @LAST_REG_DATE AND no < #{last_message_no})) ORDER BY reg_datetime DESC, no LIMIT 50
select * from chat_message WHERE channel_no = #{channel_no} ORDER BY reg_datetime DESC, no DESC LIMIT 1
